Content.Text:
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Oh, it's you. I'm busy. If you need
something, come by later.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. Where does the time go. I've
gotta make some money soon, or it'll be
too late.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Why don't you go do some work instead
of pestering me, you lazy bum.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hehehe... Out of my way. I just came
up with a good equation.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>If I don't write it down now, I might
forget it! Get out of my way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Would you be so kind as
to buy something from me dear? I need
money.
<PAGE>
I don't care what you buy. Just buy
something. I'll be waiting for you at
the store.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The daytime is so tiring. I can't wait
for night to arrive.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehehehehe! Finally my hour has
come! I feel so full of vigor!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You know, I like the
night.
<PAGE>
When it's night, it's nice and quiet. 
That makes it easier to get on with my
research. Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ehehehehehe. I just love the night.
I wish it could be night all the time.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*Sigh* It's too bright. Sunlight is
such a nuisance, don't you think?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cloudy days are a little better than
sunny days because at least it's not as
bright out.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's wrong with this crazy weather?!
Not only is it too bright, it's also too
hot! Blech, how miserable!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is wonderful weather—for me that
is. Ahehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh. What terrible weather. I can't
believe how sunny it is.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes! Rain! Glorious rain! Block out the
sun with your magnificent clouds!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The way the sunlight reflects off the
snow on the ground hurts my eyes. I
can't wait nightfall.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Snow clouds have covered the sun. Yes.
Now I can continue my research in peace.
Hehehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes! Yes! Yes! The energy of this storm
is so wonderful! I must find a way to
harness it for my research!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so grateful that this snowstorm is
here to block all that dreadful
sunlight.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard you're in a courtship. How fun
it must be to be young! Hehehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is there any food laying around here?
Anything would be fine.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I ran out of research materials. I'm
looking for some kind of replacement. I
hope there's something I can use.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm. It should be right around here
somewhere...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What are you doing here?! You're
interfering with my research!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's see...from that river... Then a
splash...Carry the one... Hmmmm...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And finally... Should be the height of
this mountain... Factor in for wind...
<PAGE>
Eeek! Are you spying on me?! You little
sneak!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh my. I'm starved... Maybe I'll just
eat that grass over there.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Could you give me this farm? It would
make a perfect laboratory.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>In return, I'll give you everything that
I've invented so far. How about it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Why you! How dare you refuse!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I could use this farm for more important
things than what you're using it for!
Won't you sell it to me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>You little! How dare you refuse!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehehehehe! This is fantastic. I
just love dark places! And I can't get
enough of the smell!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I come here often for minerals for my
experiments. It's always a whole day's
work, and I'm exhausted when I get home.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is a bit lonely, but I think I
can do decent business here.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become much livelier. I
have more customers now, but I also have
less time for research.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This has become quite an impressive
town. Plus, my research is almost
finished.
<PAGE>
Just you wait. Soon, I'll make an
announcement that will astonish the
world. Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing? If you're not busy,
why don't you become my assistant?
<PAGE>
I can't pay you money, but I can give
you knowledge. You refuse? Are you
crazy?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've done so much research that I've
hardly had time to sleep. I bet you want
to know what I've been researching?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Why would I tell the likes of you?
Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It must be tough working so hard on the
farm every day. Hehehehehe!
<PAGE>
Is your work rewarding? My research sure
is. When it's completed, it will be
monumental.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Friendship won't earn you a single
penny.
<PAGE>
Unless it makes me money, I don't want
to hear about it. Anyways, I've got to
get back to my research. Busy busy busy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hey! Don't interrupt my thinking! Hehe
hehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have any intention of becoming
buddies with you in this town. It would
be pointless.
<PAGE>
Whatever time I have I must devote to my
research. It's something you'd never
imagine in a million years.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to do spectacular research in a
faraway town. I spent my time holed up
underground researching and researching.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But I ran out of money and haven't been
able to continue my research. So now I
have to earn more money.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, if you feel sorry for me, how
about you buy something? Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My oh my. You're quite a strange fellow.
It seems like you're always meddling in
my business. 
<PAGE>
Then again, nobody's paid this much
attention to me before. When my research
is finished, I'll show you first!
<PAGE>
You should be grateful. Hehehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Is that for me? Why, this is a
Stamina Booster XL! Hurry up and give it
to me! *gulp* *gulp*
<PAGE>
Hah! Hehehe! Ha ha ha! My body feels
like it's young again. The gears in my
head are spinning so fast!
<PAGE>
Thanks to you, it looks like my research
is going to go smoothly! Hehehehehe!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aha ha ha ha! Thank you. I appreciate
this. I like it so much.
<PAGE>
I can keep researching without taking a
break to eat. And it works quickly after
you drink it. I really love it.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehehe. You've got something nice
there haven't you? It's for me? Then
I'll take it!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh. What good will this do anyone?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ugh. Disgusting! What a terrible person
you are! How dare you give this to an
old person like me?!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Aaaaaaaaaaa!!! What are you holding?!
<PAGE>
No matter how hungry I am, I'd never eat
something like that. You're
incorrigible!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that big thing? Is that from the
farm? Well, I'll eat it later then.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehehehehe! To think that the
technology exists to make this so big!
It's amazing!
<PAGE>
I'm more concerned about the technology
than the food. Tell me how you did this!
I'll use the information wisely!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What? You won't tell me? Why you
little...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. Don't get in my way. 
Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nuisance you are. Just leave me
be.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heh! Hehe! Hehehehe! It's a
Stamina Booster XL! *gulp* *gulp*
<PAGE>
Oh yes! I have so much energy! <MYNAME>,
I'm very grateful for this.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh! It's food! This is easy to ingest
and highly effective! <MYNAME>, I'm very
grateful.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
Ohhh, you've really given me something
nice here. <MYNAME>, you've got
potential. You ought to be my assistant.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
Well, I suppose I have no choice then.
I'll accept your gift. Hehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
What am I supposed to do with this? I
don't have any use for it.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>How could you give me something that I
hate so much?! You're dreadful. 
Absolutely dreadful.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>*Gasp* Aaaaaa! Get it away from me!
<PAGE>
What kind of birthday present is that?!
I'm begging you, take it away!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh my. This is a lot to eat. I wonder
how long before it goes bad...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT>
Oh dear. You say it's my birthday? Hmm.
Is it really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Understanding the technology behind this
could help me advance my research. Tell
me how you made it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>How dare you! You won't tell me?! I'm
just dying to know...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this yellow thing? It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this noisy thing? What a
nuisance!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this big bird? It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Would you listen to that annoying
yapping. What a nuisance!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this fat dog! It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Would you listen to that annoying
barking? What a nuisance!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this big fat dog! It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Would you listen to that annoying
meowing? What a nuisance!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this fat cat! It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Would you listen to that annoying
meowing? What a nuisance!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this fat, hairy cat! It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's this? It looks like I could sell
it, so I'll take it. Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahehehehe. I don't care about the
Pumpkin Festival, but I'll take what I
can get.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's this feather? Get it away! It's 
in the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's this ring? Get it away! It's in
the way!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehehehehe. I've got something good
for you. Here, take it.
<PAGE>
What? It's your birthday? Is that so?
Well, congratulations.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Your birthday? Am I supposed to 
care? Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now who are you again? I'm not good at
remembering faces.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to exchange something, hurry
up and spit it out.
<PAGE>
If you don't want to exchange anything,
get out of here. You're getting in the
way of my business and research.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you interrupt me while I'm eating,
I'll use you in my experiments. 
Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love a nice, cool, stone bench.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As someone who likes pink, I can't say
no to a pink bench.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like a dark, black bench. I wish
everything could be black. Hehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This scarecrow...looks like something I
could use in my experiments... Huh? Oh,
just talking to myself. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Forget about it. Ahehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this pot would be perfect for
putting my specimens in.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hm? Oh, nothing. Forget I said anything.
Ehehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this pot would be perfect for
putting my specimens in.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hm? Oh, nothing. Forget I said anything.
Ehehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this pot would be perfect for
putting my specimens in.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hm? Oh, nothing. Forget I said anything.
Ehehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cart is a bit worn out... But I
might be able to use it to carry my
specimens.
<PAGE>
I might borrow it for a bit sometime.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I had a cart, I could do business in
far-off towns.
<PAGE>
I might borrow it for a bit sometime.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice table. You can tell that
it's handmade, plus, it looks
comfortable.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The light of this beacon is just right.
Streetlights are no good. They're too
bright.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my. The cold sensation I get when
I touch this stone lamp sends chills
through my body.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my. The cold sensation I get when
I touch this stone pillar sends chills
through my body.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Totem poles seem like they have some
sort of mysterious power.
<PAGE>
I might be able to harness that power
for my experiments.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Totem poles seem like they have some
sort of mysterious power.
<PAGE>
I might be able to harness that power
for my experiments.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love a good bird fountain. Look at how
the water comes out of the duck's mouth!
Hehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like arch-shaped bridges. It's not
that I want to cross them. Rather,
I'm drawn to the beauty of their design.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Of course I'm sure someone like you
wouldn't understand. Ehehehehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, it's a well. The bottoms of wells
are so nice and dark. They look so
soothing. Hehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this is uncommon...an obelisk! Where
did you find something like this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What?! You say you made it?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ahehehehe. Oh. It's just replica? Well,
I have to admit that it looks rather
real.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A stone marker! Now this is uncommon. 
What does it say? Huh? Even I can't
decipher it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What?! You say you made it?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ahehehehehe. Oh. It's just a replica?
Well, I have to admit that it looks
rather real.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, this is a big robot. I want to use
it as a reference for my experiments, so
can I dismantle it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What?! No?! Oh, it's just a decoration
that doesn't move? What a phony!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's quite snug, but I like places with
this sort of atmosphere.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a lot of interesting things to
see. I like the atmosphere too, so I've
decided to come for occasional walks.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel a mysterious force here. It's
giving me mystical energy. Hehehehe.
My experiments will go well today.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hate potted flowers, but trees are a
different story. Especially, bonsai.
They're tiny, but still look ancient.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's not what you'd expect, and I like
that. Hehehe.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Potted cherry trees are nice because you
can watch the pretty petals fall. Of
course, I only watch them at night.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hate flowers, but trees are a whole
different story. I like gingkoes because
they remind me of twilight.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Palm trees are so tropical. You can get
coconuts from them, right? Does that
still work with a potted palm tree?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like pink, so I'm a fan of this pink
flower basket.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something I like about this 
round bush. The craftsmanship is 
immediately apparent.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can get a sense for the aesthetic of
the craftsman by looking at the branches
of the pine tree.
<PAGE>
Dynamic but also sensitive. I could look
at this all day.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like cherry trees because you can
watch their beautiful petals fall. Of
course, I only watch at night.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hate flowers, but trees are a whole
different story. I like gingkoes because
they remind me of twilight.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Palm trees are so tropical. You can get
coconuts from them, right?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like pink, so I'm a fan of this pink
fence.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love a good Stone wall. The way that
they're cold to the touch, it's just
so comfortable.
Now's not the time for presents.
